targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  sum(amount) as total_revenue
FROM payments

SELECT
  count(*) as total_payments
FROM payments

SELECT
  count(*) as total_attendances
FROM attendances

SELECT
  avg(amount) as avg_payment
FROM payments

SELECT
  toDate(timestamp) as date,
  sum(amount) as revenue
FROM payments
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date

SELECT
  c.name,
  sum(p.amount) as value
FROM payments p
JOIN classes c ON p.class_id = c.class_id
GROUP BY c.name
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 5

SELECT
  c.name as class_name,
  count(*) as payment_count,
  sum(p.amount) as revenue,
  avg(p.amount) as avg_payment
FROM payments p
JOIN classes c ON p.class_id = c.class_id
GROUP BY c.class_id, c.name
ORDER BY revenue DESC

SELECT
  toDate(timestamp) as date,
  status,
  count(*) as count
FROM attendances
GROUP BY date, status
ORDER BY date

SELECT
  status,
  count(*) as count
FROM attendances
GROUP BY status

SELECT
  c.name as class_name,
  count(*) as total_attendances,
  countIf(a.status = 'checked-in') as checked_in,
  countIf(a.status = 'checked-out') as checked_out,
  countIf(a.status = 'cancelled') as cancelled,
  round((countIf(a.status = 'cancelled') * 100.0) / count(*), 2) as cancellation_rate
FROM attendances a
JOIN classes c ON a.class_id = c.class_id
GROUP BY c.class_id, c.name
ORDER BY total_attendances DESC

SELECT
  c.name,
  c.capacity,
  count(a.event_id) as actual_attendances,
  CASE
    WHEN c.capacity > 0 THEN round((count(a.event_id) * 100.0) / c.capacity, 2)
    ELSE 0
  END as utilization_percentage
FROM classes c
LEFT JOIN attendances a ON c.class_id = a.class_id
WHERE c.capacity IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY c.class_id, c.name, c.capacity
ORDER BY utilization_percentage DESC

SELECT
  t.name as trainer_name,
  count(c.class_id) as class_count
FROM trainers t
LEFT JOIN classes c ON t.trainer_id = c.trainer_id
GROUP BY t.trainer_id, t.name
ORDER BY class_count DESC

SELECT
  c.name as class_name,
  CASE
    WHEN c.capacity > 0 THEN round((count(a.event_id) * 100.0) / c.capacity, 2)
    ELSE 0
  END as utilization
FROM classes c
LEFT JOIN attendances a ON c.class_id = a.class_id
WHERE c.capacity IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY c.class_id, c.name, c.capacity
ORDER BY utilization DESC
LIMIT 15

SELECT
  t.name,
  t.specialization,
  t.rating,
  count(c.class_id) as total_classes
FROM trainers t
LEFT JOIN classes c ON t.trainer_id = c.trainer_id
GROUP BY t.trainer_id, t.name, t.specialization, t.rating
ORDER BY total_classes DESC

SELECT
  r.name,
  r.capacity,
  if(r.has_equipment = 1, 'Yes', 'No') as has_equipment,
  count(c.class_id) as total_classes
FROM rooms r
LEFT JOIN classes c ON r.room_id = c.room_id
GROUP BY r.room_id, r.name, r.capacity, r.has_equipment
ORDER BY total_classes DESC

SELECT
  r.name as room_name,
  count(c.class_id) as classes
FROM rooms r
LEFT JOIN classes c ON r.room_id = c.room_id
GROUP BY r.room_id, r.name
ORDER BY classes DESC

SELECT
  member_id,
  count(*) as total_attendances,
  min(timestamp) as first_attendance,
  max(timestamp) as last_attendance,
  dateDiff('day', min(timestamp), max(timestamp)) as days_active
FROM attendances
GROUP BY member_id
ORDER BY total_attendances DESC
LIMIT 50
